body: I really hope someone translates this to english! So that I can understand the context of what is happening. I gave this a 9/10 back in Otokonoko Heaven Vol. 39 because damn... there is a fantastic as shot in page 6 and I loved how it the sex position changes from Caliper to Doggy so nicely, there's even a cute ass trap face while her ass gets fucked in page 13 in upper right panel, like dat reaction Holyshit so hot, so yeah this is pretty much fantastic as expected from one of my favorite trap artists of all time.
